Pre-Game Insights: The Mariners are coming off a win on Monday.

Julio Rodriguez finished with three hits and two RBIs for the Mariners.
Jason Heyward hit a home run for the Astros.

The Mariners are averaging 4.13 runs while their pitching is giving up 3.78 runs per game.

Betting Trends: The betting odds for this game are Houston Astros -161 / Seattle Mariners +137.
The Over/Under for this game is 7.5.
Prediction: The Houston Astros are going to have little issues getting the offense going here, and that is going to be the difference here. The Astros are averaging 4.65 runs per game. Valdez is on the mound for the Astros and he sits with an ERA of 2.85. The Mariners' offense has been a major problem all season, and they are going to really struggle to get the offense going here. Back the Astros on the run line.
